findings.title: ChangeP2EWallet
findings.description: The ChangeP2EWallet function has a public access modifier and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized changes to the wallet.

findings.title: SetMarketingWallets
findings.description: Unprotected function SetMarketingWallets allows arbitrary wallet updates.

findings.title: Unprotected Constructor
findings.description: The constructor of a contract can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function allows the owner to exclude an address from fee.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function allows an owner to include a fee address.

findings.title: setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled
findings.description: Public function setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled allows onlyOwner to enable or disable swap and liquify functionality.

findings.title: _reflectFee
findings.description: Private function _reflectFee has potential security risks

findings.title: _takeContractToken
findings.description: Private function _takeContractToken has restricted access.

findings.title: isExcludedFromFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: SetTaxes
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: SetLaunchTimestamp
findings.description: The SetLaunchTimestamp function has onlyOwner access control and can be modified by the owner.

findings.title: _swapContractToken
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability due to lockTheSwap modifier.

findings.title: swapTokenForBNB
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in private function swapTokenForBNB

findings.title: addLiquidity
findings.description: External call marked as dangerous

findings.title: _tokenTransfer
findings.description: The _tokenTransfer function has potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in _transfer function

findings.title: _transferStandard
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: _transferToExcluded
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transferToExcluded function allowing unauthorized access or manipulation of excluded addresses.

findings.title: approve Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The approve function has a vulnerability marked by 🛑 symbol.

findings.title: Unprotected Public Transfer Function
findings.description: The transfer function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in transferFrom function allowing non-whitelisted wallets to interact with the smart contract.

findings.title: Unprotected Permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability through sync
findings.description: The contract is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to the usage of low-level calls without the 'sync' modifier.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
